name: Eternal Ring
description: Eternal Ring is a first-person RPG developed by From Software, tells of the kingdom of Heingaria a land in turmoil as warmongering Elders and a powerless king vie for control. As Cain Morgan, the adopted son of the king's general, players journey to the Island of No Return in the hope that you'll be able to retrieve the fabled Eternal Ring, while at the same time uncovering more about your past and your true destiny.
